trans-unit.source: Provides the strong name of a code assembly as evidence for policy evaluation.
This class cannot be inherited.
The <xref:System.Security.Policy.StrongName> class represents evidence of a unique, cryptographically strong name of a code assembly.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Policy.StrongName>類別代表的程式碼組件的唯一密碼編譯強式名稱的辨識項。

trans-unit.source: The strong name consists of a public key, a given name, and a version.
trans-unit.target: 強式名稱所組成的公開公鑰，指定名稱和版本。

trans-unit.source: The public key corresponds to the publisher's private key which is kept secret, and with which the assembly must be signed in order for the strong name to be valid.
trans-unit.target: 公開金鑰會對應至發行者的私用索引鍵，這會保持秘密，而必須順序為有效的強式名稱簽署組件與。

trans-unit.source: Strong names are typically assigned to assemblies using either <xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyKeyFileAttribute>, <xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyKeyNameAttribute> or <xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyDelaySignAttribute> in conjunction with the SN utility (see [Sn.exe (Strong Name Tool)](~/docs/framework/tools/sn-exe-strong-name-tool.md)).
trans-unit.target: 強式名稱使用的組件通常會指派<xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyKeyFileAttribute>，<xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyKeyNameAttribute>或<xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyDelaySignAttribute>搭配 SN 公用程式 (請參閱[Sn.exe （強式名稱工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/sn-exe-strong-name-tool.md))。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission> uses this class to confirm that calling code is in a particular strong-named code assembly.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission> 確認呼叫程式碼在特定的強式名稱程式碼組件會使用這個類別。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.StrongNamePublicKeyBlob" /> of the software publisher.
The simple name section of the strong name.
The <see cref="T:System.Version" /> of the strong name.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.StrongName" /> class with the strong name public key blob, name, and version.
The `name` parameter can be `null`, but it cannot be an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: `name`參數可以是`null`，但不是能是空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: For more information about strong names, see <xref:System.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission> and <xref:System.Security.Permissions.StrongNamePublicKeyBlob>.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關強式名稱的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission>和<xref:System.Security.Permissions.StrongNamePublicKeyBlob>。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="blob" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
-or-
The <paramref name="name" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
-or-
The <paramref name="version" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
The <paramref name="name" /> parameter is an empty string ("").
Creates a new object that is a copy of the current instance.
A new object that is a copy of this instance.
Creates an equivalent copy of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.StrongName" />.
A new, identical copy of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.StrongName" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.Evidence" /> from which to construct the <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission" />.
Creates a <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission" /> that corresponds to the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.StrongName" />.
A <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission" /> for the specified <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.StrongName" />.
The identity permission for a strong name can be used to determine whether calling code is in a particular strong named code assembly.
trans-unit.target: 強式名稱的識別權限可以用來判斷是否呼叫程式碼在特定強式名稱程式碼組件。

trans-unit.source: The strong name to compare against the current strong name.
Determines whether the specified strong name is equal to the current strong name.
<see langword="true" /> if the specified strong name is equal to the current strong name; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
Gets the hash code of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.StrongName" />.
The hash code of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.StrongName" />.
Gets the simple name of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.StrongName" />.
The simple name part of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.StrongName" />.
Gets the <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.StrongNamePublicKeyBlob" /> of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.StrongName" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.StrongNamePublicKeyBlob" /> of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.StrongName" />.
A blob is cryptographic information that uniquely specifies the public key of the software publisher.
trans-unit.target: Blob 是唯一指定的軟體發佈者的公開金鑰密碼編譯資訊。

trans-unit.source: Blobs differ from certificates in that the blob only has information about the public key; the certificate also includes information that associates the name of the holder with the key as well as information to verify the certificate.
trans-unit.target: Blob 與不同的憑證 blob 只包含公開金鑰; 的相關資訊憑證也會包含具有索引鍵的持有者的名稱相關聯的資訊以及驗證的憑證資訊。

trans-unit.source: Creates a string representation of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.StrongName" />.
A representation of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.StrongName" />.
This method is useful during debugging to get an easy-to-read representation of the object.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得之物件的容易閱讀表示偵錯期間，此方法相當實用。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Version" /> of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.StrongName" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Version" /> of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.StrongName" />.
